results.title: Home Sweet Home, Rustic Home Decorations, Artificial Succulents Pot, Wood Box Planter, Living Room Decor, Bathroom Decor, Shelf Decor, Plant
results.description:
One of the simplest ways to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere is with plant life. Perfect decoration gift for your loved ones this Fall and Winter Season! 🌵

Add a pop of greenery to your home, office space, work space, bathroom, or shelf with this set of 3, 5, or 6 artificial succulent plants and 1 or 2 real wood planter. Lifelike in color and texture, these plants feature realistic detailing including cement-like pots and beautiful succulents with each of the five planters. 

Each plant features a different style. If you crave the beauty of the outdoors without any of the inconvenience, these faux succulents are the solution. Use them to make any space’s decor pop with some green life! Achieve a modern and rustic look without breaking the bank. This set of fake succulents are not only perfect for home decoration, they make for excellent housewarming and new year gifts! 🎁

Our artificial plants are handmade from high quality nontoxic materials. Faux succulents are a safer option for those with allergies and pets since they do not affect air quality or develop mold. Hassle free since fake plants require no watering, fertilizer, and pesticides. Enjoy the beauty of plant life without the pest and mess. ☀️

Wooden Box Planter Size:
1. Length - 8.25 inches (Small Box)
2. Length - 12.75 inches (Long Box)
2. Height - 1.50 inches
3. Width - 3.10 inches

Plants Size:
1. Diameter of Pot - 2.5 inches
2. Height of Pot - 2 inches
3. Shortest Plant - 2.5 inches
4. Tallest plant - 6 inches

Places To Decorate:
1. Coffee Tables
2. Floating Shelf / Mantle
3. Kitchen Counters
4. Office Desks
5. Bathroom
6. Kitchen Island
7. Home
8. Apartment
9. Rental Home Decor (Airbnb)
10. Entryway
11. College Dorm
12. Balcony

Care Instructions:
No care necessary! Suitable for indoors and outdoors. Please note that ceramic-like pots are made from paper pulp and should not be in contact with water.

Conditions of Return:
Buyers are responsible for return shipping costs. If the item is not returned in its original condition, the buyer is responsible for any loss in value.

results.title: Vinyl Wall Art Live Laugh Love Vinyl Wall Decal  | Large Vinyl Decor | Housewares Home Decor Wall Decal Wall Decor
results.description:
Live every moment, Laugh Every Day, Laugh beyond Words Decal 

This peel and stick vinyl decal is ready to be applied to any smooth, clean surface.
Great for Home, Bedroom, Dorm Wall and Windows. Easy to apply and remove.

Use on any smooth surface: Wall, Cars, Trucks, Boats, Bikes, Windows, Mailboxes, The default color is BLACK

 We Can Make this Decal Larger or smaller to fit your project. Please contact me for quote on larger  sizes.
___________________________________________________________
✬✬ Vinyl Decal Product Details

• High quality non glare matte vinyl (painted on look)
• Easy to apply and removable
• Not reusable after removed from surface
• Premium Commercial Grade Vinyl -  Waterproof, and UV protected
• Decal will last for years without peeling or fading
• Use Indoors or Outdoors. 
Indoor applications will outlast the paint.
           Outdoor applications last 5-6 years.
•This die cut decal has no background. The background is surface you place the decal on.
•Our decals can be applied on 90% of all walls, including slightly textured walls, interior & exterior walls, mirrors, or any smooth surface.

• Made in the USA
___________________________________________________________
✬ MADE TO ORDER

Every decal is Made-to-Order once purchased. This means that we will cut your design in the color you have chosen.

Different sizes available. Please select from the drop down menu for pricing.

You will be provided with an instruction sheet along with your order. Whether this is your very first time using a vinyl decal or you are a seasoned pro, please don't hesitate to get in touch with me if you have any installation questions.

*Instructions are provided with each decal or download here:

Depending on how many orders are needing to be processed, it can take anywhere from 1 to 5 business days for your order to be cut and shipped out. We do our best to get your orders completed proficiently and as quickly as possible, so you can enjoy your new design.

results.title: Love T-Shirt. Love Shirt. Gift For Girlfriend. Love Tee. Honeymoon Shirt. For Wife. Bridal Shower Gift. Bride Shirt. Mrs Shirt. Love TShirt
results.description:
This Love women T-shirt would make a great gift for moms, friends or for yourself.  This unisex crew-neck t-shirt is printed using high-quality Bella-Canvas T-shirt and is printed in our studio in Florida. 


A B O U T :

-Bella-Canvas Unisex Jersey Short Sleeve Crew-Neck Unisex T-Shirt
-Soft and High-Quality Fabric 
-Size: XS to XL
-Solid colors are 100% cotton (Red, White, Black, Pink)
-Heather colors are 60% combed ring-spun cotton/ 40% polyester lightweight jersey (Heather Blue, Heather Gray, Heather Green, Heather Peach, Heather Maroon, Heather Mauve)

These are not women fitted shirt as they are unisex t-shirt.  You might want to downsize your regular size if you want a fitted look.  Please refer to sizing information in the description as well as in listing photos.


P R O D U C T I O N :

We used only high-quality t-shirt. We do not take fabric quality lightly, as we only wear the best ourselves. Our shirts design are printed with Direct-to-garment (DTG) machine with water-based ink. This process makes our designs very high-quality print, permanent and safe for washing. It is not recommended to dry on a high setting.

Allow 1-3 business days for your order to be completed (this does not include ship time, ship time is dependent on the method of shipping you choose and your location!)


C A R E   I N S T R U C T I O N :

Machine wash, inside out and wash cold. 
Lay flat to dry.
Do not bleach and do not dry clean.
Simple right!?!



Love T-Shirt. Love Shirt. Gift For Girlfriend. Love Tee. Honeymoon Shirt. For Wife. Bridal Shower Gift. Bride Shirt. Mrs Shirt

results.title: Live, Love, Laugh Charm - Memory Locket Charms - Fits 25 and 30mm Floating Memory Lockets
results.description:
Tell your story by customizing our eye-catching stainless steel glass memory lockets with our charms.  As your life story changes so can your locket by changing charms, switching plates or adding a dangle.  This Live, Love, Laugh charm fits 25 and 30mm floating memory lockets.  Tell your story by designing your unique Lyfe Locket; with beautiful floating charms.  
    
Lyfe Lockets make great conversation pieces; by personalizing your locket with our charms you can share snippets of your life with family and friends.  Design your locket by adding a music note and guitar to show your passion for the art of music, a peace sign and flag will show your love for the freedom of our country, share your favorite hobby by adding an artist’s palette or camera.  With your creativity locket expressions are limitless!

Lyfe Lockets are unique keepsakes that are a pleasant surprise for any mom, sister, daughter, grandmother, granddaughter, aunt, niece, daughter-in-law, sister-in-law or friend.  They make great gifts for birthdays, graduations and holiday celebrations.  They can be given to moms-to-be, just-because, Sweet 16, or to show that important someone in your life just how special they are.  Tell your story today or give a locket that tells a story for a family member or friend.  The charms, plates and dangles can be changed along the way to keep your Lyfe Locket alive with an exciting story!

Chains, Lockets and Plates can be purchased separately.

NOTE – Lockets and charms are not suitable for small children; they are glass and contain small pieces.

What you will get:

1 - Live, Love, Laugh Charm that fits floating lockets (pink)

results.description:
INSTANT DOWNLOAD DIGITAL FILE

PES, CSD, HUS, SHV, DST, EXP, PCS, HUS, VIP, JEF, SEW, XXX

Stitch Count- 2956

Width= 1.62" Height=1.63"

Embroidery design ONLY. This listing is for a digital design to be used on a embroidery machine. 

Once payment has cleared you will be able to download a zip file which will include:

~~~Single file in all formats
~~~Finished product picture
~~~PDF Instructions
~~~ 4x4 and 5x7 sorted files for supported extensions


You will be able to download your digital file through your Etsy account once payment has been cleared. If you have any problems with your download, please do not hesitate to contact EmbroiderThat.

To download your file, open the designated email and click the button "View your files on Etsy". You will be redirected to the download page where you can download the zipped file containing your purchased design(s). 

You can also download the designs from Etsy directly. 
My Account > Purchases > Click on the download button next to the purchased item.

Please note that you must have an embroidery machine in order to use these files. You must also have a way to transfer the files from your computer to your embroidery machine. 

When you purchase this listing you will receive a zip file with a digital design of the formats listed above. You ARE NOT purchasing a shirt, a patch or an outfit. Pictures may be included to show how the design is used.

Due to the digital nature of our products, NO refunds or exchanges will be given. You may use this design to make items for personal use or for small commercial jobs. You may NOT copy, share, sell or reproduce my digital designs in any format as your own.

All designs have been stitched out and tested.

If you re size, convert or edit my designs in any manor, I can not be responsible for the quality of design.

ALL sales are final. No refunds will be given due to the digital nature of the product.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Clock
results.description:
Live Laugh Love Clock;
This popular design reads; Live long, Laugh often, Love much. The neutral black and white color scheme fits any home!

All clocks are made to order in my studio in rural Ohio. 5 sizes are available. Only the best quartz clock movements are used. The clocks are tested for 24hrs before they are shipped. 1-AA battery is required.

Production Process- Clocks are produced with fade resistant inks. The artwork is carefully mounted onto a laser cut, 1/4" thick MDF panel. A special UV resistant coating is applied for a durable finish. Dependable quartz clock movements are used. Clock hands are aged to match the antique vintage look of the clock.

Every purchase from this store helps to support a Lupus Warrior.  Thank you so much for visiting.
